channel.title: Internet connection
channel.description:
Please help!Well my internet connection seems so slow lately..I am on a dlink router..and it seems whenever my brother is downloading and such it slows my internet down tremendously..and if I play x-box live it lags alot.Well I was wondering how to limit it and such without him knowing?I am not sure if he is downloading..but believe so.Isp = Shaw cable high speed.
Also in my network connections theres two..one is called like 1392 adapter or such and is speed : 400mpbs this one does nothing..no recieving or sending packets.Other one which is Lan and is working is at speed 100mpbs..wondering if I can benifet with the other one?Also I do have a wireless linksys router that is not hooked up,should I hook it up and such?
Please and thanks.
Mainly trying to fix my lag issue on x-box live.

item.title: Internet connection
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

If you want to limit your brothers usage, you’ll have to set up some sort of program on his pc. Hardly any “router in a box” type deals support traffic shaping or any other qos stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Internet connection
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

If your internet speed is slower than it’s supposed to be, then maybe you should call your ISP.

Read full topic
